subject: p19991135
History: Status post right upper lobectomy and mediastinal lymph node sampling.
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. The air component of the hydropneumothorax in the right apical region has resolved, now there is only fluid in the pleural space. Patient has known severe emphysema. The perihilar opacities have almost resolved. Thoracostomy in the right sixth rib is again noted. Multiple surgical chains projecting the right hilum. There is no evidence of pneumonia, CHF or new lung opacity.
